name: showily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is intended to be noticed or to attract attention: They were sent to local schools and dressed no more expensively or showily than any of their classmates. He began talking showily on a mobile phone as they passed each other on the pavement. See
showy
More examplesFewer examplesThey showily check their image in hand mirrors and fluff and fix their hair.The waiter showily held the bottle by the bottom while pouring, but he had clearly not mastered the technique. Cody is a rockhopper penguin, the kind with yellow plumes sprouting showily out of their heads.
